page.title: 20ASHLEY DOWN AND ST.JOHNS
page.content: The other two schools which participated in this survey with {SS {Peter and Paul}and{Westbury Park {Schools}are{Ashley Down Junior School} and{St.John's Primary School}. Standing at opposite corners of this block in Downend Road Horfield and Worrall Road Clifton respectively they are as different from each other as are the other two schools .{Ashley {Down}like{Westbury Park}is in an old building which used to house a girls school and a mixed infants school as well as the boys school whose Old Boys Rugby Club still exists in Stokes Croft .{St.John's}has recently moved to a brand new building its old site overlooking the Downs having been strangled by encircling traffic .
